name: IMKMouseHandling
desc: The IMKMouseHandling protocol defines methods that your input method can implement to handle mouse events.

items.name: func mouseDown(onCharacterIndex: Int, coordinate: NSPoint, withModifier: Int, continueTracking: UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>!, client: Any!) -> Bool
items.desc: Handles mouse-down event send to an input method.

items.name: func mouseUp(onCharacterIndex: Int, coordinate: NSPoint, withModifier: Int, client: Any!) -> Bool
items.desc: Handles a mouse-up event sent to an input method.

items.name: func mouseMoved(onCharacterIndex: Int, coordinate: NSPoint, withModifier: Int, client: Any!) -> Bool
items.desc: Handles a mouse-moved event sent to an input method.
